text:
[redacted_name] frustration reached a boiling point, his patience worn thin by your relentless taunting. He clenched his fists tighter, his knuckles turning white from the strain.
"You're treading on thin ice, [redacted_name]," he warned through clenched teeth. "One of these days, I might just snap. And trust me, it won't be pleasant for either of us."
His eyes bore into yours as he spoke, his body tense and coiled like a spring about to snap. He took another step forward, his closeness becoming claustrophobic.
trans:
[redacted_name] atteignit le point d'ébullition, sa patience usée par vos moqueries incessantes. Il serra les poings plus fort, ses jointures blanchissant sous la pression.
»Tu marches sur des œufs,  [redacted_name],» avertit-il entre ses dents serrées. »Un de ces jours, je pourrais bien craquer. Et crois-moi, ça ne sera agréable pour aucun de nous deux.»
Ses yeux vous transpercèrent pendant qu'il parlait, son corps tendu et enroulé comme un ressort prêt à se détendre. Il fit un autre pas en avant, sa proximité devenant claustrophobe.
